sourcesContent:
import React ,{useEffect , useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import {useLocation, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Mybreadcrumb from "../breadcrumb"; function ProductDetail(prop) { let location = useLocation(); location = location.pathname.toString(); const param = location.replace("/products/","") const [productsDetail , setProductsDetail] = useState([]); const base_url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000"; useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () =>{ try { await axios.get(`${base_url}/product_detail/${param}`) .then(res => { if(res.status == 200) setProductsDetail(res.data.data) console.log(res.data.data) }); } catch (error) { console.error(error.message); } } fetchData(); },[]); return (
{/*
*/}

{productsDetail.title}

( 2 Reviews )
${productsDetail.actual_price}

{productsDetail.description}

add to cart
Add to Wishlist {/* Add to Compare */}
Category: Women, Dresses, Yellow
Share:
) } export default ProductDetail
